13.content:
You run quickly with the girl in your arms, avoiding the three Knightmare Frames racing through the streets. You run down an alley and hide yourself behind a few trash cans. You're an honorary Britanian and student. If any soldiers find you they wouldn't hesitate to kill you.

Suddenly you hear a loud robatic voice, "Stop. In the name of Britannia!" You don't have to turn around to know that you've been spotted. You brace yourself. As soon as they find out you're only honorary they'll shoot. You still hold the girl tight in your arms. She's still hurt. Atleast maybe they'll help her.

The soldier called over the two others as they stepped out of their Knightmares. The soldiers fixed their guns on you. "Give us the girl!"

You can tell by the look in these guys that if you hand her over she'll die. But what can you do?
13.title: Honorary Eleven

choices: Pick up the girl and run
131.content:
You clutch the girl tighter in your arms. You look at her. For some reason you can't let her get hurt. You place her gently on the floor behind you and stand over her.

"If you filthy Britannian scum want her your going to have to go through me first!"

"Gladly." The Britannian in the middle says as he aims his gun at your head and shoots.
Suddenly in the back of your mind you begin to see the strange world you visited when the girl kissed you and a red bird-like sigil. Time seems to slow for a moment as you return to your world. the bullet is once again speeding toward you. In the last second before the bullet reaches you, you will it away.

This power, the "Geass" has given you telekinesis. You look at one of the soldiers and you will the gun out of his hand and into yours. You aim it at another soldier holding a gun on you.
131.title: Refuse

choices: straight - underground should be safer than above, right?
left - you might be able to get protection from Zero
right - you feel like causing Britannia a lot of trouble from the inside
1311.content:
"Well then, my friends I'd say this is check mate to me wouldn't you?" you say sarcastically, whilst willing the guns out of the hands of the other two soldiers. The soldiers turn pale. "now...now lets not be hasty, how about we let you and the girl go and well call it even, no need to get violent here" says one, clearly the groups commander.

"Ahh, I love the sight of a filthy Britannian begging for his miserable life, especially when hes a captain too." you lower the guns slightly, the soldiers let out a sigh of relief. "But unfortunately, you've seen what I can do, and so I can't let you go." you will the guns back to being point black on their foreheads. "DIE"

A sicking squench fills the alley as the soldiers heads are blown apart. Inside you feel, a mix of emotions, happiness, sadness (and because of the sight before your eyes a little bit sick too). You look back down at the girl. "Well now, i suggest we get out of here, as good as this power is, I don't feel like taking on Britannia all by myself."

You pick up the girl, and look around you, you have three options. If you go straight ahead it'll lead you underground, away from the fighting of the Knightmares, but you know its almost certainly going to be crawling with soldiers from both sides on high alert. If you go left, you should be able to make it to Zero and the Black Knights, and if you go right, which is almost out of the question, your going to be heading right into the centre of the Britannian army.

You sigh "Well, got no choice here, guess I'll take my chances and head
1311.title: Kill the Britannians

choices: before you can begin to talk with her, you here footsteps coming down the tunnel
13111.content:
"Well, got no choice here, guess I'll take my chances and use the old underground system to get out of the area" Picking up one of the dead soldiers rifles, a pistol and several magazine cases, you sneak towards the entrance of the underground, taking care not to be seen by any passing Britannian Knightmares and soldiers. All around you, you can hear the death screams from both civilians and soldiers on both sides. "Its true what they say" You think to yourself "When wars rage, its the innocent who die."

Upon reaching the entrance to the Underground, you ready your gun and slowly walk down the stairs, listening out for even the slightest sound of life down here with you. As you walk through the darkness, you feel the girl on your back beginning to stir. "uhh where am I?" You look back over your shoulder (though its to dark for either of you to make out each others faces) "'bout time you came round" you say. "I'll fill you in on everything soon, but for now, keep quiet." You continue walking, the girl holding on tightly to you, though you reckon she can probably walk, you decide against putting her down, incase the two of you get seperated in the darkness.

As you continue, you reach a station platform, although not in great condition (it wouldn't be having not been used on almost 8 years), some of the electricity it still working, and several lights are on, along with a bench in almost perfect condition, save for a large amount of dust on it. The light also shows the one thing you'd been fearing the most, the path ahead was blocked by rubble. "Just great" you think to yourself. "Hey, can you walk?" you ask the girl on your back. "I can, though my left leg is slightly asleep, but thats probably due to you carrying me more than anything" The girl replies, with a slight giggle. You lower her down from you back, and the two of you climb onto the ruins of the platform.

Glancing around the area, you come to the conclusion that perhaps, this wasn't the best idea. You walk over to the bench, putting the gun on your lap, and sigh. The girl walks over and sits next to you.
13111.title: straight - underground should be safer than abo...

choices: you reach the Black Knights before the girl wakes
the girl wakes before you arrive
13112.content:
Well, got no choice here, guess I'll take my chances and head left, I'd rather be found by the Black Knights than by Britannia" you think. Making sure that the girl is safely holding onto your back, you pick up one of the dead britannian's guns, as well several ammo magazines and begin to head down left towards the resistence.

It wasn't easy to sneak around the place with a girl on your back, you had to keep ducking to avoid being spotted by Britannian soldiers. Fortunately your telekenisis abilities made things a lot easier than they would have otherwise been. Using you powers, you knocked many things over so as to distract the troops whist you snuck by them.

after 10 minutes, you stopped for a rest. the tension was killing you, and girl on your back was a lot heavier than she looked. You utter a chuckle "better not say that to her face when she wakes up, after all 'hell hath no furry like a woman scorned'." you thought to yourself. You glanced back over your shoulder, you could see the girl begining to stir. "Beter get a move on, this isn't the place I really want to be stoping in whist I fill her in about whats happening here."

the question is, will you reach Zero and the Black Knights before she wakes?
13112.title: play it safe and head left

choices: stay hidden for a little bit longer
131121.content:
After a few minutes more walking, and climbing over debris from destroyed buildings and vehicles, you eventually come to group of people wearing black outfits. Not wanting to jump straight out into the open, you decide to listen into what they're saying before you make yourself known, after all, they could be Britannian spies or decoys to lure people out.

"Man talk about a pain, I thought we'd got Cornellia this time" says one of the men.
"yeah I know, the sooner we capture her, the better, we can use her to end this war and gain back our independence." says another
"Anyway, any news on Zero's mistress? Has she been found yet?" asks the first
"No, and don't call her that, we don't know for sure if they have got anything going on at all" says a third.
"aw c'mon the girls the only one who knows who Zero really is, that means they've got to be close for him to tell her something like that right?"
"anyway, lets get back to searching, the sooner we find her, the sooner we can get back to HQ and rest."

Just then some of the debris slips under your foot, getting the attention of the men. "crud" you thought to yourself, still unsure whether or not this lot were Black Knights. "Who's there, show yourself!" one of the men yell.

Do you show yourself, or stay hidden?
131121.title: the choice

1311211.content:
"Who's there, show yourself!" one of the men yell.

You stand up on the debris, in full sight of the four men, gun at the ready "I'm not taking any chances" you thought to youself. You walk down the debris, struggling to keep your balance on the rubble. "woah don't shoot, don't shoot" you yell.

the four men look at you cautiously. Its only when they get a good look at your face do they break their silence. "Ah, your Japanese huh?" One of them asks. You nod yes. "I'm right in thinking you lot are the Black Knights?" you ask, though you already know the answer to that. "Yeah we are, what do you want with us?" another asks.

"Right now, I need to get somewhere safe, and this girl needs medical attention." you say, turning around, showing them the girl holding onto your back.
"Hey thats C2!!" one of them yells. "Where the hell did you find her?" he asks. "In an alley in the centre of the town, she was already out-cold by then. After rescuing her from a group of britannian soldiers, I came here looking for you lot." The men all look at each other, slightly skeptical. you decide to break the silence. "Look, doubt me all you want, but this girl needs medical attention." you say. Just then you hear the sounds of explosions in the distance. turning around, you see the sky filled with Britannian bombers. "aw crud, thats not a good sight! you yell.

One of the men runs forward "here, pass her to me, you get inside the truck." You hand the girl over and run into the back, still holding your gun at the ready. Your quickly joined by two of the others, including the one carrying the girl. He lays her down, then looks to the front of the truck "OK we're in, floor it!" he yells. Almost instantly, the truck belts into life and speeds away from the battlefield. You watch as the sky begins to flash with explosions as the bombs are dropped from the planes.

as the flahses dim, you let out a sigh and put the gun down.

"tell me kid, how'd you get hold of that thing?" asks the guy sitting next you. Not wanting to say i used my powers and killed three people with their own guns, you decide to make something up. "Oh this, I found it on a dead Britannian whilst heading here. I decided to take it as it could have come in handy should i have run into any trouble"

the guy smiles "Wise thinking, your a natural survivalist." he says. he reaches into his pocket and gets out a radio. "Zero, its me, we've got C2... yeah some kid found her in the centre of town and carried her to us, we're bringing him along to the HQ with us... ok, over and out."
the guy looks back at you. "Its a long drive kid, you may as well shut your eyes for a bit, we'll keep an eye on the girl."

You nod in agreement, and shut your eyes. Before you know it, your fast asleep.
1311211.title: show yourself

choices: Try to get to the Sutherland
Grab your Assualt Rifle and run
13112111.content:
You and the soldiers walk in to the HQ to find Zero sitting on a chair, right in front of your very eyes. "My dear Black Knights, what have you brought me now?" asks Zero. "It's just this kid we found in our hideout. No worry though. He's Japanese." "I see." says Zero. "Umm...I found this girl lying around the street." you say as you show Zero the girl. "That's C.C!" Exclaims one of the soldiers. "How did you find her?" asks Zero. "I just found her in this alley." you answer. "Hmph. Very well." Zero responds. "I...I have a confession to make..." you say. "I...killed somebody." "Two Britannian soldiers...." "However, they were trying to shoot and take this innocent young girl!" "That's no girl, that's a witch." Zero says. You look puzzled. "A witch?" "No matter." says Zero. "How much hate do you feel towards Britannia?"

Before you can answer, several Brittanian Knightmare frames bust through the ceiling. All of the soldiers run to get in their Knightmare Frames. Zero gets into his. "Quick, throw me the girl!" He yells. You toss the girl and miraculously Zero catches her. "That one! Over there!" Zero yells as he points to a Sutherland.

Bullets are flying left and right, explosions are happening right in your face. In the confusion, you finally see the Sutherland. You are unsure if you can make it from there without getting shot.
13112111.title: at the Black Knight HQ

choices: The Japanese Resistance managed to save you in time
A student ordered them to cease fire and commit suicide
132.content:
"I don't think I'll hand her over to you britainnian scum.", you replied.

"Is he an eleven?", said one of the soldiers.

"Doesn't matter, we need her back alive if preferable. Last chance! Hand her over or die!", yelled one of the soldiers.

You notice a gun lying on the floor you carefully walk near it while carrying the girl but set her down just close enough so that it doesn't look like your reaching for the weapon. One of the soldiers holsters his weapon away giving you the moment to go for the gun and start firing at them. You shoot at them, though with terrible aim, but distract them to pick up the girl and try to lose them.

You hide behind an abandoned warehouse hoping nobody would find you but unluckily the exact opposite happened. A squadron of troops had executed innocent eleven's causing you to cringe at the dreadful sight. They hear you and order you to come out. You slowly do as they say and place the girl gently on the ground again.

"Think he's an eleven?", said the captain.

"Think so sir, and he has the target.", replied one of his subordinates.

"Very good then. Men aim and fire!", he ordered.

You wished that they wouldn't fire their guns at you but surprisingly they didn't...
132.title: Attack them

1323.content:
"All of you! Cease fire and kill yourselves.", said someone right next to you from a short distance. In both amazement and horror they did as they were commanded.

They all shot themselves in the head and died one by one. You turned to face who it was who gave that order but it was someone you wouldn't expect. A Britannian student! "How did you get them to do that?", you asked but felt a bit afraid.

"You have the power of Geass and therefore could be useful in my plans. Bring her with you, we can't leave her out here or else they might be suspicious.", he replied.

"Wait a second who are you and how do you know about Geass?!", you demanded.

"I'm Lelouch. C.C gave me the power to make anyone follow any command I give them, just like how she gave you your power.", he explained.

"But I don't know mine yet.", you replied.

"You'll know it when you need it and how to use it on others. For now stay here, there's two Knightmares headed our way. When we get out of here you can choose whether to help me destroy Britannia or go your own way, but for now our same goal is to get out of here alive.", Lelouch explained.

"Fair enough.", you picked up C.C and hid behind some debris until it was safe to come out. Lelouch managed to get the two Knightmare pilots to hand over their Knightmares and allow you two to use them. You got in and activated your Knightmare and followed Lelouch. "So how do we get out of here?"

"The Japanese resistance will give us all we need for our escape, now listen to me and I promise you'll survive this.", Lelouch replied.

You were a bit unsure of him but he acted like he knew what he was doing so you trusted him enough to get you out of there that much at least. But then again you weren't certain of his intentions, maybe he might use you for his own ends?
1323.title: Meet Lelouch

choices: Go with the group fleeing from the battle
13231.content:
Seeing how you had little choice right now and that getting out on your own would be suicide you decided to follow Lelouch for the time being. While you didn't trust him you at least didn't see him as an idiot so you at least knew he had a plan that just might work. "Alright wait there until I give you my orders, for now your code name is G7.", Lelouch said.

"Like a chess piece? What am I a pawn?", you resented.

"Trust me, following me right now is better than trying to escape in a stolen Knightmare frame with something they want while all their forces are being aimed here and not away from the battle. Have a little faith.", Lelouch persisted.

"It's not like I don't put my faith in you, I don't trust you.", you confessed.

"I'd have expected nothing less considering what happened within the last couple minutes. Bear with it and you'll be out of this soon.", Lelouch said riding the Knightmare into the battlefield.

You stood at your position awaiting his orders and prepared to face any enemies or do something that could cripple Britannia's defenses. After a few minutes Lelouch gave his orders, "G7 assist Q1. She needs back-up at this location, the enemy has her trapped hurry.", he ordered.

You drove the Knightmare to the location and hoped you would make it in time. Thankfully you had some average control over the Knightmare frame but you were far from a decent pilot, you could only figure out how to move and fire the huge gun in it's hands. By the time you reached the location you saw a red Knightmare being chased by a few others on a bridge. You determined who was your ally and then fired at the enemy causing them to evacuate their Knightmares.

You received a communication from Q1, "Thanks, I owe you one."

You wanted to reply to her thank you but you thought for now you had to keep a low profile until you got the hell out of there. "Now everyone head underground and demolish the structures. The enemy is surrounding my false signal and are headed right for the trap.", Lelouch ordered.

You did as instructed and demolished the underground structures supporting the surface. To your amazement the entire squadron was wiped out as planned. You were amazed by Lelouch's strategy but then by the time you got up to the surface the resistance was being wiped out by a single unit.

"What's going on out there?!", Q1 yelled.

"A new model is breaking though our defenses! He's tearing the others to shreds! Ah!", the transmission was cut off meaning this new Knightmare model was an effective piece of hardware. "I'm going to try and slow it down for the others so they can escape!", Q1 said headed for the unit's path of destruction.

What do you do now?
13231.title: Follow him

132311.content:
"Hang on I'll watch your back.", you replied. In battles like these sticking together is the only way of staying alive. You followed Q1 to the path leading to that model, however you recived a transmission from Lelouch.

"I need help! That Knightmare's got me pinned down! I can't beat him and I can't shake him off!", Lelouch yelled.

"Hang on were already on our way! Where are you?"

"A few buildings to your right. Gah! I don't have any more time!", Lelouche yelled in frustration and fear.

Q1 saw Lelouch's Knightmare being thrashed by the new model and made it to stop it from destroying Lelouch's sutherland model. You and Q1 managed to hold it off for a few seconds before it easily overpowered you and Q1. You tried to escape on the Knightmare but your only option was to eject the seat and hope you could find some means of making it out of the area alive.

Your seat ejected and at least the new model gave chase to Lelouch but you guessed that perhaps he had a plan to elude it whoever was piloting that thing. Your ejection pod crashed into a safe spot in the underground transit system where you wouldn't be seen and in fact it appeared to lead into a path leading out of the war zone you were caught in.

However you saw that Q1's ejector pod was sealed up and was about to be crushed by rubble. You could save her but maybe not. She's just one person but then again it would be hypercritical to leave her since you resented being viewed as a pawn by Lelouch? Why not save her? From the look of things the entire path leading to freedom would be blocked off and a high risk of being crushed was also a factor.

What to do?!
132311.title: Go and help her

1323111.content:
You ran for the pod and tried opening the hatch, it took some effort and strength on your end but you got it open and freed the pilot who was..a very beautiful girl with spiky maroon hair on the back and two strands over the sides of her face. She got out as soon as you had it opened wide enough and started climbing out of that death trap. At that point you knew you couldn't escape without being shot or caught by Britannia so you had to live with the fact you chose morality over survival.

"Thanks, you saved my life there.", she thanked panting a bit from the recent predicament.

"No problem. Although we need to find a safe place to wait out until the army clears out."

"I know where to go. We'll regroup with the resistance and figure out a plan from there follow me."

"You know I didn't catch your real name on the radio."

"Kallen Kōzuki. Your name?"

"It's Aaron. Nice to have saved you."

Kallen managed to lead you to her group where they hunkered down in a warehouse full of civilians. They kept them like hostages but weren't planning on killing them.

"Glad you made it back Kallen. Who's this?"

"Ohgi, meet Aaron, he saved me earlier and was one of the people following that guys orders. He's on our side."

"You an Eleven?", he asked making sure you had a credible background.

"Yeah."

"That's it?"

"He's fine Ohgi he's earned his place among us."

Just then the doors sprung open with Britannian soldiers surrounding everyone and were ready to fire at you when..
1323111.title: Save the pilot!

13231112.content:
You unwillingly activated your Geass and it surrounded the entire warehouse you wished that the soldiers didn't know you were here. For some reason they all looked confused wondering where you all were. They were standing a few feet in front of all of you yet you managed to make it seem like you were all invisible. You however planted the idea in everyone else' mind that they were hiding from them somehow. You then wanted them to picture that their own people were the resistance.

They all looked at each other and killed themselves. You were amazed at what you just did but then you noticed blood coming out of your nose. You wondered why that was but no matter you tried to stop using your Geass and soon enough you managed to pull it off. Everyone came back to reality Kallen and Ohgi wondered how they all died.

"What happened?"

"They must have been shot by that guy on the radio who was using that Knightmare. He saved us yet again.", you lied making up a fake cover. You wished you could have just planted it in their minds but you didn't know if it would kill you since your nose bleed from planting two ideas in several people's minds.

"Aaron your bleeding.", Kallen noticed.

"It's nothing. Trust me I just got knocked in the face when I crashed earlier it's nothing honest.", you lied to cover your Geass.

"Well one things for sure we need to get moving and re group with everyone else. Kallen you need to re-plant yourself back into Ashford. Tomorrow."

"Ok but what about Aaron?"

"Wait a second? I'm an honorary Britannian I can just enroll there like nothings wrong."

"We don't need two people there."

"Actually I think there someone there I used to know who could help us. Just trust me, I'll get in there no strings attached."

"Fine with me if your so certain. Alright then let's move out people.", Ohgi ordered.

You only wanted to go with Kallen because Lelouch wore a school uniform when you met him. You knew that the best way to speak with him was by enrolling there, by means of your Geass now that you figured out what it can do.
13231112.title: The Power of Illusion

choices: "Yes, I'll help you with your plans."
"I'll help, but just with only the resistance for now."
132311121.content:
After a few uses of Geass on the people responsible for the enrollment process and covering your tracks well enough you entered the school like you were apart of it from the start. You tried to find out where Kallen was after you had a "schedule" planned out for the day but to your surprise you noticed Lelouch first. He was as shocked to see you there as you were, at least at this point early on. He approached you and wanted to speak to you privately.

"How did you know I enrolled in this school?"

"I didn't. I did because one of the resistance members is enrolled here.", you lied.

"But why did you really?"

"Because I had to figure out my limits of my Geass on a closed area. It seemed like the easiest place to do it.", you kept your face in a seriouse state to make it seem to be legitimate.

Lelouch pondered your explanation and believed you to be telling the truth. In hindsight you made up the excuse to fool Lelouch but it was only a half truth as you needed to learn your limits on it and this place was an idea setting for it.

"Who is the resistance member?"

"Q1, the one who helped me save you, with the red hair."

"I see. So what is your power?"

"I know if I refuse you you'll use your Geass to tell you mine so I won't waste my breath, I can create Illusions in a persons mind. But only in their mind, so far I've been able to generate only one illusion to a group of several people.", you answered. You purposefully left out you had managed to generate two set's of illusions instead of only one just to hold back that info in case you had to keep it from Lelouch for safety reasons.

"Impressive, with that kind of power I can't lose against Britannia. I take it you'll join me in my goal's to annihilate it? After all we have the same goal do we not?"

"We do, that much is certain however working for your grand schemes might not be in my interests. And how do I know you won't have me choose the way YOU want me to go about?"

"You don't know, and I believe I know someone who can help you with understanding your Geass. So are you with me?"
132311121.title: Lelouch's Offer

1323111211.content:
"Excellent, for now find Q1 and do what you will but make sure she doesn't talk about what happened yesterday."

"She'll trust me. When do I meet this person who's going to help me?"

"Tonight meet me in my room and you'll meet her."

"When?"

"7:30 and don't be late.", Lelouch said leaving.

You parted ways for the time being and tried to find Kallen. After a few hours you saw her having her lunch at the main yard with her class mates. You walked over casually like it was just a simple hello but the girls around Kallen took it as what others would expect. Ooooo's and giggling to clarify.

"Hi Kallen, finally found you."

Kallen turned surprised and worried hoping you would be quiet about her name. She stood up and greeted you friendly like, "Hi Aaron, listen can we talk later I'm not too comfortable talking about stuff we need to say in front of my friends."

"Oooooooooooooooooooo", the women reacted to Kallen's reply.

"I get it, your busy. I'll find you later around where?"

"Oh by the roof on the school building after class.", she said. For some reason her manner of speaking was different when she talked to you yesterday. She was more shy, dull, and it felt more like she was tired the entire time. But perhaps it was a mask to keep her real personality secret from the school since she was to them a terrorist.
1323111211.title: "Yes, I'll help you with your plans."

choices: A few days later...(You are: Saren!)
13231112111.content:
When classes ended you waited until Kallen met up with and not long after she showed up acting more like how she acted when you first met her. "I suppose you figured out why I'm acting differently around everyone."

"Your keeping your soldier persona a secret to hide out with the enemy. Clever tactic. So here your a girl who is sick all the time, but out there your really you. A determined fighter trying to resist Britannia. Quite an interesting life you lead, though some would say hazardous to say the least since Britannia is the worlds largest country."

"I fight for Japan. Not for the entire world, that's impossible."

"There is only a few things that are considered impossible, but defeating Britannia isn't among them. If we had the resources and a brilliant leader, we'd be able to do it."

"Are you that leader?"

"I wasn't the one on the radio, but I do know that if we do this right they will know what it means to suffer total defeat.", you stated.

"Your an Eleven right? Why do you hate Britannia?", Kallen asked.

"On the contrary, I don't hate it. In fact I owe one of it's royal families a debt. They spared me when one of the younger daughters found me trying to hide from the guards and so I was brought on as their...servants and friend to his majesty's daughters. But eventually I was discarded but was left a better life than in the ghettos. It wasn't easy, hell even as a servant I hated myself for doing things no one at my age should do. But I do this for a much different reason. Something you might be aiming for as well, but not so much comparable by scale.", you explained.

"I see. So you want them out of they way just as much as we do?", you nodded to answer her question.

You two parted ways for the day glad you were able to talk to her more casually than before. But now you had to see another friend of yours, Lelouch. You arrived at the time and place as Lelouch said earlier but you thought you went insane when you saw C.C alive!

"What the hell?!"

"You left me in your Sutherland seat.", she said blankly.

"Wait? What is going-"

"C.C ran into the tunnel that lead out of the battlefield before it collapsed while you ran to save some expendable soldier from the front lines. That was not a smart move, leaving a valuable piece like that left open to the enemy.", Lelouch said clarifying her sudden resurrection.

"But you got shot."

"She can't die, trust me she can't. Also good work in telling me who that pilot was, now I have the information I needed from her after you two left each other alone.", he continued.

"You were spying on me?"

"I had to find out some way, it was the fastest way to do so. C.C why not run by what he needs to know.", Lelouch said working on his computer.

"To put it simply, Lelouch plans to destroy Britannia and re-make it into a better one. He wants your power of Geass to help achieve those ends. His first step is to recruit the Japan resistance movement, than same people from before.", C.C explained.

"I knew some of that stuff, but how do we get them on our side?"

"Easy we need a symbol. And a Name for it. You will need ones for yourself, mine happens to already be planned out."

"You mean, like we become hero's in their eyes?"

"Yes and no. But in your case since I need your power to help me win this, you must be at my side as well. You need a name..."
13231112111.title: Two Truths and a lie

132311121111.content:
The stage was set, your audience was waiting...

With Lelouch making and supplying the necessary arrangements for this little meeting of the minds you and Lelouch were about to introduce your new persona's. You both waited in a train car waiting for the Japanese resistance to meet you in the front car and after a while they finally showed up. And they saw two strangers in cloaked costumes and masks.

Lelouch's was a costume consisting of a tight dark purple suit with golden stripes and long, wrapped sleeves. The outfit combined with Victorian fashion with that of a sleek bodysuit, elegant but practical; worn over it is a black and gold cloak with crimson spandex inside and an enormous black cape encircling the head. Its immediately recognizable feature is a spiky black and indigo mask with a long variation of the Geass Sigil stretched over its bottom, completely hiding the wearer's face — appearing opaque from the outside, but transparent from the inside.

Yours was a costume with similar features regarding the outfit underneath Lelouch's cloak however; yours was white with red stripes, and your cloak was more of a cape hanging off from your shoulders with red and white representing the colors of Japan. And the mask you wore was a metal plate that hide your mouth and nose but except for your eyes, which you kept covered by a transparent tarp with white outlines resembling upside-down triangles while having a grayish hood to have it hang over.

http://th02.deviantart.net/fs44/PRE/f/20...

"So was that you the other day? You who ordered that cease fire?"

You and Lelouch turned and as you did the room went dark blue. "So what did you think of our tour.", Lelouch said.

"You see the difference, the settlement and the ghetto.", you finished.

"Yes we know, there's a harsh difference between us and them that's why we resist them."

"You are all wrong. Britannia will never lose to terrorism, a petty war that will lose before it's even begun.", you said.

"What you face is Britannia itself! With us it is a war that can be won! A war waged not on the innocent! Take up your swords and fight for justice!", Lelouch replied.

"Easy for you two to ay, how can we trust you both. Take off the masks and show us who you are.", one of the resistance members happened to be Kallen and beside her was Ohgi.

"Perhaps if we gave you the impossible, then you'd have gained our trust?", you answered.

"We have a plan and it involves saving Suzaku Kururugi and showing Britannia's weakness. Meet us by the dump at sunset, there the plan will be further explained. If any of you decide to help your free to come at your own will.", Lelouch said.

"Who are you two?", Ohgi asked.

"I am Zero."

"And I am Saren."

Soon the train stopped at an empty stop by the tracks letting them off. They left wondering about showing up at sunset. But it was over for now, the first phase was done. Phase two planned to be much more interesting.
132311121111.title: A few days later...(You are: Saren!)

choices: You let Zero speak with him
1323111211111.content:
Sunset...

"I see only you two then.", you addressed Ohgi and Kallen.

"I'm sorry but if you two gave us more time then we'd be able to convince the others-", Ohgi tried to explain but Zero cut him off.

"You two will do just fine. Your all we need to pull this off."

"We will save Suzaku Kururugi from execution, and the all we need from you two by tomorrow is this.", you pointed down to the broken parts of a used car. "The exterior must resemble that of the late, Prince Clovis' car. The exterior is all that matters, ounce finished we'll rely the remainder of the plan.

"Hang on, how can pull this off?! It's only four of us.", Kallen resented.

"With all of us combined, it will be nothing but child's play.", Zero replied.

"You two sure have a lot of pride and confidence in this, but we still don't trust either of you.", Kallen warned.

"If you won't trust me, trust Saren. He wears the colors of Japan and is the avenger of Japan, for he is an Eleven."

Kallen and Ohgi were both surprised yet somewhat saw this possibility arise to fact hearing those words from Zero. "But what about you?", Kallen asked.

"Zero's history is irrelevant. I suggest working on the vehicle now. We will return and ready at these co-ordinates.", you said handing them a torn out part of a map.

After you left the two you arrived back in Lelouche's room in the academy. "I wasn't expecting you to reveal my heritage like that so soon.", you pointed out.

"They might not have followed through if I didn't tell them. Besides it will keep their blind trust in at least you until we make ourselves credible regardless of these things. For now they will soon know that one of the people leading them to Britannia's defeat is an Eleven."

"Fair enough."

Hours later...

The stage was set, the pieces are in place, no turning back now. You and Lelouch were standing on top of the fake car and readied to reveal yourselves to Britannia. Kallen was driving the car while Ohgi was positioned down by the bridge where you would intercept Suzaku's escort and make your escape. From the looks of things the time had come and the moment of truth came.

The flag of Britannia burned to a crisp revealing two masked figures on Prince Clovis' transport.

"I am Zero."

"And I am Saren."

The crowds gasped in awe of this crazy act seeing two terrorists commit such brazen audacity against a full military convoy. "I've seen enough! this show is over.", yelled Jeremiah Gotwald. He fired a shot signalling the convoy to drop his sutherland but you and Lelouch stood your ground. "First things first Saren and Zero, remove your masks.", he ordered.

You and Lelouch pretended to comply but instead you snapped your fingers and the back of the car revealed the same weapon that supposedly held poison gas. Where in reality it held C.C. but Jeremiah had no idea what was inside so the trick worked flawlessly. Jeremiah in response pointed his gun at you both but Lelouch offered a deal before he fired his weapon.

"Fine what are your demands?!', he asked.

"An exchange, this for Kururugi.", you answered.

"Like hell! He's charged of murdering the prince!"

"No Jeremiah you are wrong. The one who killed Clovis was myself!", Lelouch confessed.

"For a single Eleven, you will save scores of Britannian citizens. I think we all find that a fair deal don't you think?", you said.

"They are made I tell you! They will pay the price for mocking the crown!", Jeremiah yelled pointing his gun at you both again along with enemy Sutherlands surrounding you holstering their weapons as well.

"Careful...you wouldn't wan the public to learn of 'Orange' do you? If either of us die it will all go public.", you said.

"And if you don't want it to happen, you'll do everything in your power to let us go, your prisoner as well.", Lelouch commanded utilizing his Geass on Jeremiah.

"All right, you heard him! Release the prisoner now!", Jeremiah said under the influence of Geass.

They reluctantly handed over Suzaku with you Zero and Kallen walking over with the detonator for the bomb in your hand. "Thank you for your co-operation Jeremiah, until we meet again!", you said activating the gas. The Britannian soldiers attacked as a result of the gas coming out of the device but Jeremiah, instinctively following the orders given to him, ordered them to stop attacking his comrades in response.

You, Kallen, Zero, and Suzaku jumped off the bridge with Ohgi launching the tarp to break your fall and thus make your escape. Your mission succeded but now all that was left was dealing with Suzaku.
1323111211111.title: Phase Two

13231112111112.content:
"Well Suzaku Kururugi, the country you served turned it's back on you. Now you have no where else to go except here. Zero and I believe that aligning with us would help free Japan from Britannia's grasp. Join us.", you offered.

"I can't accept. You killed all those people."

"Wrong, the gas was a bluff. No one was harmed and we succeeded in our goal."

"So your all about results. Is that how Zero thinks?"

"Indeed he does. It's the only means of freeing Japan."

"Your wrong. If I work my way up to the ranks of the military then I can change the system from within and not have to kill anyone."

"You honestly believe you can change it from within? Impossible, it's too corrupt and filled with its vile natured bureaucratic leaders. Your hopes to make it a reality are misguided and your energy is wasted on trying to fight for it. This is the only means of making real change happen."

"Regardless, I'm going back and facing my trial."

"Do what you must Suzaku, but I warn you, your odds of being found innocent are slim. Even with Zero's claim to the murder."

"You at least show honor. Something people lack nowadays."

Suzaku left much to Lelouch's anger. "You let him go?!"

"He would have left either way there was no point in stopping him.", you explained.

"None the less, we showed the resistance of what we can do. For now I must make preparations for our next move. Until then continue to be a student at Ashford until I need you again.", Lelouch said.

"Very well. But what ever happens we are now wrapped in the center of change we have now set in motion on the world. It won;t be the same when this is over.", you said philosophically.
13231112111112.title: You talk to Suzaku

choices: You meet with Ohgi and Kallen as Saren
You meet with Ohgi and Kallen as yourself
132311121111121.content:
Later after the stunt you pulled as Saren, you pretended to belong in Ashford with the students as ordered by Lelouch. While you were at school you felt rather happy there with everyone. Even though it was based on a lie that you were Britannian, you felt like you had real friends there. But the only real one you could really talk to was Kallen. You two knew who the other really was and related to a lot of what Britannia did to you both.

It was an average day for a while until the speakers had an unusual announcement, "People of Ashford Academy: There is a cat running loose in the school and has something on it. As the President of the student council I want everyone to try and bring it to me. And whoever catches it will win a big prize! A kiss from a member the student council AHAHAHAHA!"

"That's stupid. Nobody will- Where did everyone go? Ah jeez.", you said seeing all of the students leave trying to find it. Then you got a call from Lelouch "What the hell is going on here?"

"You have to help me find that cat! My helmet is on it's head!", Lelouch said hanging up. You disbelieved that something like a feline could expose the identity of Zero but you didn't waste much time in trying to find it. It would prove hard since the whole school was involved and with Zero's helmet on the cat's head it would be a miracle if no one saw it.

You looked around where most of the students weren't looking thinking maybe it was hiding away from all the commotion. To your surprise you heard a meow from up near the bell tower. You ran as fast as possible up to the tower and saw the cat starting to climb it's way up to the bells. You carefully scaled the bell tower and reached for the helmet. The cat was no consequence but the helmet was and with careful precision you snagged the helmet and grabbed on to part of the ceiling nearly falling off.

You heard the crowd of students surrounding the bell tower but from this height they couldn't see the helmet. You slowly descended back down to the window and hid the helmet safely where nobody would look. Better to leave it and pick it up later where nobody is watching then try to sneak it out with everyone starring at you. As an added bonus the cat came down to the window and jumped in your arms purring. Animals always seemed to like you.

Lelouch finally scaled the tower to find you took care of the pesky cat problem. "Good work, that was too close.", he said with a sigh of relief.

"I left the helmet over by that old trunk. Nobody will think to check in there. You can pick it up at your convenience."

"Good, you did good today Aaron. I owe you one.", Lelouch replied grateful.

"I'll remember that...Lelouch."

You and Lelouch walked out with you holding the cat. To the student council president's dismay she knew any "dirt" on Lelouch was gone since he walked out with you. "What was that cat carrying anyway?", asked one of the student council members.

"I'm an old friend of Lelouch's and his secret is safe with me so don't bother trying to get an answer from me.", you replied.

"Well, seeing as you caught the cat I guess you won the prize.", the council president noted.

"But I don't want it. I only participated to help out my friend so there's no business in taking a prize I wasn't after in the first place.", you kindly rejected.

"So what? You wouldn't want to get a little smooch from one of the student council girls?", she flirted.

You instinctively turned toward Kallen since she was the only one you'd really wanted a kiss from. She noticed you looking at her and blushed in response. You thought there wouldn't be any harm in it so you walked over to her. "Just a small peck on the cheek.", you asked her. Kallen was a bit shocked that you asked her and for such a small request. She thought it would be on the lips but instead you chose to be a gentleman and earn something that special later in life.

She descended on your cheek and lightly kissed it thus with the crowd cheering in celebration for catching the cat. "This school is just weird. No wonder Lelouch is crazy.", you thought.
132311121111121.title: The catching of the cat

1323111211111211.content:
A couple days later you and Lelouch set up a meeting in your new headquarters. It was time to reset the image from a resistance group into what they were trying to be, Knights for justice. Soon enough they arrived and you met with your friends as Zero's right hand, Saren.

"Welcome, we've been waiting for you to arrive."

"This place is huge. How did you two get this?"

"We borrowed it from a friend who owed us a favor. No strings attached."

You noticed Kallen walking inside which brought some awkwardness to yourself after the cat incident not long ago. Kallen walked in noticing Aaron was not inside.in fact she didn't seem to notice that he was there at all. "why has an Aaron arrived yet? He didn't come in with us so why isn't he here? Could he be?"

Then one of the rebels switched on the tv and saw one of the Japanese rebellion leaders had taken hostages in a hotel. The footage showed some of the student council as the hostages causing you, Zero, and Kallen to be uneasy. "Idiotic methods performed by the Japanese. I dont tolerate this act of crulity."

"What should we do then?", asked Ohgi.

"Although I detest this, Zero is the one who makes the calls and it is for him to decide. "

"Then what is our next move Zero? "

"I will need time to think this over. We cannot go in without knowing what were dealing with."

Zero left to figure out what todo while you sat around wondering what was going to happen. But you grew nervous when Kallen walked up and asked you somethig, "Saren, have you seen someone named Aaron? He's part of our group but he should be here except he's not."

"Aaron... I know him well. He is my oldest friend of mine who saved me when Britainia first invaded. I sent him on a mission that will prove benefitial in the long run. Do not worry he is safe. (Except he's Saren. But she can't know that. But should I tell her?)"
1323111211111211.title: You meet with Ohgi and Kallen as Saren

choices: Skip to the Black Knight speech
13231112111112111.content:
"Kallen, I must speak with you in private. Meantime everyone begin unloading these boxes from the closet. Place them wherever suits you best as long as it's effecient."

You entered your personal quarters and walked Kallen inside. For all that's been going on recently you had to trust someone, someone you could rely on in the heat of battle. "Kallen, I'm afraid I lied earlier about Aaron. I sent him on no such mission. "

"Then where is he?"

"He's here, except nobody but me knows. But now you will as well. "

"What do you mean?"

You lowered your hood and removed your mask revealing your identity to Kallen. She walked back in shock but didn't leave, she gasped at the truth that you were the right hand of Zero. "Aaron? Is it really? "

"Yes Kallen, I am Saren. The right hand of Zero and Japan's embodied anger to Britainia. Only Zero knows my identity, but now you know as well. "

"But why? How?"

"It's complicated to say the least but rest assured I will tell you everything in due time. But listen to me, Ohgi can't know this and now isn't the time to explain. You should be honored to be the first person I entrusted with this secret."

"Just tell me one thing! Why? Why become Saren? "

"Because Britainia had taken what mattered most to me before my honorary status. So to put simply, vengence.", you put back your mask and hood and told Kallen to help the others bt before she left you asked one thing, "Can I trust you to keep my secret from the group? "

"For now...Saren. "

"That's all I ask until the truth settles and we deal with this matter."
13231112111112111.title: Trust her

132311121111121111.content:
"Fellow Britainians have no fear, the hostages are alive safe and sound. We deliver them as a gift to you. People, fear us! Or rally behind as you see fit, we are the Black Knights! We of the black knights stand with who have no weapons to weild. Regardless they be either elevens or Britainias.", Zero began.

"The Japan liberation front cowardly took innocent lives, and they mercilessly killed them in cold blood. It was a meaningless act, and therefore was punished. Just as vicoroy Clovis slaughtered countless unarmed elevens, we could not stand by and watch these innocent Britainian citizens be executed.", Saren continued.

"We will not reprumiate a battle on a faire and even field, but neither will we tolerate a one sided blow to the weak by the strong. The only ones who should kill, ARE THOSE WHO ARE PREPARED TO BE KILLED! Those of you with power, fear us! Those of you without it, rally behind us. We the black knights shall be the one's who judge the world. Wherever oppressors abuse their power on the defenseless, we shall strike again no matter how mighty or formidable our foe may be!", Zero finished.

The yot sailed out of Britainia's reach and everyone returned to the headquarters safely. Now the world knew who you were, knights for justice. And with Kallen and Zero by your side, there was nothing to stop you now.
132311121111121111.title: Skip to the Black Knight speech

1323111211111211111.content:
A few days had passed and the Black Knights were already becoming popular with the elevens. You and Zero were busy coordinating strikes against crime in Area 11 while struggling to find the right time to explain everything to Kallen. She kept your secret safe but was starting to grow impatient after a while. Then after weeks of cracking down crime before making a desicive strike on Britainia, there was finally a time to tell her everything.

One day on the student council building Kallen was up on the roof looking at the settlement. Seeing her peopl's legacy in shame made her feel angered by Britainia's iron fisted policy and wished on day the Japanese would have their home land back. "I know what your thinking.", you said catching her by surprise. "How could they be so cruel by treating us like dirt? It sickens me to the core."

"Aaron, why did you adopt the name Saren? "

"Zero is the leader of the Black Knights, I'm the hand the points him to the Japanese's interests and aid him in his affairs."

"Then I have to ask. Do you know who zero is?", Kallen asked with some hesitation.

"I do Kallen. But I can't tell you, Zero doesn't even know that I told you my identity myself. But believe me when I say he's a true savoir for the Japanese. Someday that land over there that was taken from us, will be ours again. I promise you.", you swore on your word.

Kallen felt honored to have won your trust with such a sensative secret. But her thoughts still about Zero's identity still lingered. But there was one thing she wanted from you that she hoped would win your approval. "Aaron could I tell Ohgi who you really are?"

"Kallen...."

"He deserves to know. Your his friend too."
1323111211111211111.title: Continue

134.content:
your eyes glance over to the three Nightmares that have you backed into a corner, then glance down at the girl in your arms. in the dream you had when she kissed you, you had promised to protect her, and thats exactly what you where planning to do. turning to the alley on the right that showed the most promising chance for escape, you ran as fast as you could!

"Hey!, you, halt in the name of Britannia!" one of the three guards in Nightmares ordered, as all three rushed forward to capture you.

As they rounded the tight cornner they fired at you to stop you. but just as the bullets zinged over to you, you dive to the alley to the left and continued shortly to yet another turn. stopping to breath behind large dumpster, you hear the conversation relaying from the Nightmares.

"Where did he go!?" one asked

"I dont know...damn Eleven!" another said

"well its just a kid and he's carrying a girl in his arms, he couldn't have gotten far!" the last one said.

you listened with hatred in you heart as the Britannian guards try desperatly to find and kill this girl, but you cant keep running day, your only hope is to lose them or they give up.
134.title: hiding in the alleys

choices: One of the orange hair girl teammates shows up
1342.content: Suddenly an Knightmare cockpit opens up revealing a orange hair woman jumping out of her Knightmare and began to walk towards where you where. "Hey Mike, Sera look after my Knightmare for me, I am going to look inside the building." "Sure but make it quick because I want to to sit here all day." Crap. She was heading towards you. You decide to slowly go inside the build as quietly as possible with the girl in you hands. Once your onside the building you find a piece of furniture to hide behind. But just before you where going to hide you where suddenly turn around and thrown to the gorund. "Look likes you day is up filthy eleven." She was holding a pistol towards your head. You didn't want to die and was hoping for some miracle to happen. Damm it! Why did it have to end now!? You where going to keep your promise to the girl no matter what. Damm it. In only you had this girl under control. Just then you pass out. You thought you where dead but still sees your body is fine and the orange hair girl still holding the gun towards you. But how can that be? You body is still their on the gorund and nothing happened to it. "Playing dead eleven? Ha like that's going to help you." "Oh hell no!" You then rush her wait for something to happen. But then the world turn black. Just as you where waking up you felt an odd wight on your chest. When you open you eyes you saw the floor and orange hair? What!? The only person with orange hair was the girl that was about to shoot you. You slowly got up because of being in a different then yours. You see a broken mirror on the wall and what you saw startled you. It was the orange hair girl. What the hell is going on!? Just something happen. Did the girl wake up or did one of the orange girl teammates come in? Or did something else completely happen?
1342.title: They give up

13421.content: "So it's seem your Geass is to take over people bodies." You whip you head to the voice, it was the green head girl you where carrying before. "Geass?" It still weird to have the girl voice instead of your own. "It is a power I granted because of our contract." Wait, what contract? "Judging on how your face you forgot about the contract." I rub the girl head sheepishly. "So can you explain to me what the contract was?" Because honestly I am wondering who I probably sold my soul to. "That's for me to know and-----" Suddenly the radio on the girl chatter to life. "Kelly what's taking you so long to find that eleven, me and Mike are getting board waiting for you." As you were grabbing the radio from your suit you begin to get memories of the girl. Who are you?
13421.title: The girl woke up

Soon armed soldigers swarm into the room yelling "Giver her here!' They said as they aimed their guns ready to shoot at any moment.
You then think of your options when all the sudden you feel power flowing through you just then somthing happens.
You then feel a sudden pain in your mind and...
